long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple, clean, and easy to use bookmark manager.

Can be a drop-in replacement for the built-in bookmark manager, support all the features of the built-in one, with additional features such as:
1. support redo action
2. sort by url, date ascending, date descending
3. find duplicated bookmarks
4. better keyboard support
5. toggle between light theme or dark theme manually
and much more...
